SpellDef.Description:
Keeps everyone happy! (-1% to faction-wide unrest).
See Tooltip.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: ::: HIERGAMENON ENTRY ::: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
[S] REDISTRIBUTION (-333 BEERS) ::: Keeps everyone happy! (-1% to faction-wide unrest).
DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Self
EFFECT ::: - 1% Unrest #All ::: - 333 Beers
FIGHTABLE ::: Not defendable ::: Not resistible
INTERVAL ::: Instant
OTHER ::: Caster must be Sov
SOURCE ::: All
